trans-unit.source: Describes the point of reference of a figure in the vertical direction.
trans-unit.target: 描述圖形在垂直方向的參考點。

trans-unit.source: The term **content**, as it pertains to the members below, refers to the page minus the page padding or in other words the content is everything inside of the page padding.
trans-unit.target: 詞彙**內容**，因為它屬於下列成員，指的是頁面邊框距離減或其他內容的所有項目內的頁面填補的字組中的頁面。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalAnchor%2A> attribute of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure> element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalAnchor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure>項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalAnchor%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Figure.VerticalAnchor%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: Anchor the figure to the bottom of the page content area.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形錨定在頁面內容區域底部。

trans-unit.source: Anchor the figure to the center of the page content area.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形錨定在頁面內容區域中央。

trans-unit.source: Anchor the figure to the top of the page content area.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形錨定在頁面內容區域頂端。

trans-unit.source: Anchor the figure to the bottom of the page area.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形錨定在頁面區域的底部。

trans-unit.source: Anchor the figure to the center of the page area.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形錨定在頁面區域中央。

trans-unit.source: Anchor the figure to the top of the page area.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形錨定 (Anchor) 在頁面區域頂端。

trans-unit.source: Anchor the figure to the top of the current paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 將圖形錨定在目前段落頂端。
